mapper.select: select * from employees where emp_no =#{empNo} and password=#{password}

SELECT E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME ,E.PASSWORD ,E.POSITION ,E.JOINDATE ,E.EMAIL ,E.PHONE ,E.ADDRESS ,E.DELETED_YN ,E.DELETE_DATE ,E.DEPT_ID ,E.GMAIL_APP_KEY ,D.DEPT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID(+) WHERE EMP_NO =#{empNo}

SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME ,CASE WHEN POSITION = '0' THEN '사원' WHEN POSITION = '1' THEN '대리' WHEN POSITION = '2' THEN '과장' WHEN POSITION = '3' THEN '차장' WHEN POSITION = '4' THEN '부장' WHEN POSITION = '5' THEN '대표' ELSE '없음' END AS POSITION , D.DEPT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID(+) WHERE DELETED_YN ='N' ORDER BY E.EMP_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEES SET DELETED_YN = 'Y' ,DELETE_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE EMP_NO=#{empNo};
